name: Disco Doves
description:
Disco Doves is a roguelike with no weapons or blood. Take control of an insecure dove dancing its way through a disco stage in order to maintain its Disconfidence bar filled at all times. If the bar gets to 0, game is over. If another dove hits you, the game is over. 

How to Play:

Use mouse to give the disco dove a place to go. It moves on its own at the rhythm of disco music! Dance with other doves by hitting them with your "blue marker"!
